description: Jimmy wanders round back, looking for another entrance to the cabin, only to stumble upon the lusty triumvirate of Brad Benton, Joe Foster, and Alec Martinez as they warm themselves in a fraternal fashion. Still impaled on Alec's unyielding tool, Brad loudly lets fly an admirable fountain of white-hot spunk.  Overheated, over-stimulated, and ready to burst, Alec sends his own streams of manhood over Brad's lower back.  Frenzied and fulfilled, Alec laps his load from Brad's taut, tanned flesh.  Cooled, soothed, and satisfied, the threesome return to a group embrace, reconfirming the masculine bond of Eros.
series: The Other Side Of Aspen V
title: The Other Side Of Aspen V, Scene #02
